''Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint,'' Sergio Marchionne said. It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles. Both parties hope to reduce the size and complexity of the hybrid system and produce a technology that is sensitive to the needs of drivers for smooth and quiet operation.
